summary: A configuration container that encapsulates all architectural and training hyperparameters required to build a Blenderbot conversational model, such as vocabulary size, layer counts, attention heads, feedâ€‘forward dimensions, activation functions, dropout rates, position embeddings, and caching behavior.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to define, customize, and reproduce Blenderbot model instances by specifying model architecture and training settings in a single, serializable object.
